zh: 越南湄公河地区最近因为连续豪雨造成了300多人死亡，
en: More than 300 peopledeaths have been peopledeaths in the Mekong region of Vietnam recently due to continuous torrential rain.

zh: 内政部警政署刑事警察局明年将以打击毒品犯罪名义派遣5名干员赴大陆与中国公安合作打击海峡两岸犯罪，但是合作的管道还没有建立之前就已经传出四海帮帮主杨光南等8名台湾黑社会分子在大陆上海被捕的消息。刑事警察局侦察科已经去函海峡交流基金会，要求海基会协调大陆海峡两岸关系协会将日前被中共公安逮捕的四海帮帮主杨光南等人遣返回台湾。刑事局侦察科科长高政生表示，虽然海基会还没有接获大陆海协会通知，有关杨光南等黑社会分子在上海遭中共公安逮捕的消息，
en: The Criminal Police Department of the Police Administration of the Ministry of the Interior will send five officers to the mainland next year in the name of combating drug crimes to cooperate with the Chinese public security in combating crimes on both sides of the Taiwan Strait. A Taiwanese underworld member was arrested in Shanghai, mainland China. The Investigation Section of the Criminal Police Bureau has sent a letter to the Straits Exchange Foundation, requesting the SEF to coordinate the Mainland Cross-Strait Relations Association to arrest Yang Guangnan, the leader of the Four Seas Gang, who was arrested by the CCP police recently. and others to be sent back to Taiwan. Gao Zhengsheng, head of the Criminal Bureau’s Investigation Section, said that although the SEF has not yet received a notification from the ARATS, the news that Yang Guangnan and other underworld elements were arrested by the CCP’s public security in Shanghai,

zh: 1946年出生，曾经担任台北市议员，立法委员及民进党党主席。前任行政院长游锡(方方土)及其内阁成员已经于1月24日宣布总辞。根据宪政惯例，行政院长及其内阁成员在新选出的立法委员正式就职之前应总辞，台湾新任立法委员已经在去年12月11日经由选举产生，即将在2月1日宣誓就职。根据宪法，行政院长是台湾最高行政首长，由总统任命担任，不需经立法院同意。行政院长负责提名各部会首长，政务委员及行政院副院长，由总统同意任命。
en: Born in 1946, once served as Taipei city councilor, legislator and chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party. Former Executive President You Xi (Fang Fangtu) and his Cabinet members announced their general resignation on January 24. According to constitutional practice, the Chief Executive and his cabinet members should resign before the newly elected legislators officially take office. Taiwan's new legislators were elected on December 11 last year and will be sworn in on February 1. According to the Constitution, the Chief Executive is the highest executive head in Taiwan, appointed by the President without the consent of the Legislative Yuan. The President of the Executive is responsible for nominating the heads of ministries, councillors and vice-presidents of the Executive Yuan, who are appointed with the consent of the President.
